name: top_free_mac_apps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool app_store.
Tool description: Unofficial Apple App Store Api
API description: Fetches a list of the top free Mac apps from the RapidAPI App Store.

lang.description: The language for the app descriptions. Default is 'en'.

category.description: The category ID for the apps. Default is '6016'.

country.description: The country code for the App Store. Default is 'us'.

num.description: The number of results to return. Default is 100. Maximum is 200.
